list_definition.definition: (any one of) a number of steps, usually inside a building, going from one floor to another

list_ex_of_english: Other roving stairs include external stairs front and back, almost impossible to locate on plan due to discrepancies between set design and location.
I don't like stairs, from not having stairs for ten years.
